com.ibm.ecm.api.coresdk.model

Interface IBMECMAccessControlEntry


  • public interface IBMECMAccessControlEntry
    Represents an access control entry object that is used to grant access to an item.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getAccessMask()
      Returns a bitmask representation of individual access rights for this access control.
      IBMECMAccessControlType getAccessType()
      Returns the access control type that is granted.
      String getGranteeDisplayName()
      Returns the display name of the user or group that this access control is granted to.
      String getGranteeId()
      Returns the id of the user or group that this access control is granted to.
      String getGranteeName()
      Returns the distinguished name or short name of the user or group that this access control is granted to.
      IBMECMAccessGranteeType getGranteeType()
      Returns the grantee type (a group or a user) that has been granted access.
      IBMECMAccessInheritableDepth getInheritableDepth()
      Returns the maximum depth to which an access control is granted.
      IBMECMAccessControlSource getPermissionSource()
      Returns the source of the permission for this access control.

    • Method Detail

      • getAccessMask

        int getAccessMask()
        Returns a bitmask representation of individual access rights for this access control. Each bit is mapped to a IBMECMPrivilege object.
        Returns:
        the access mask

      • getAccessType

        IBMECMAccessControlType getAccessType()
        Returns the access control type that is granted.
        Returns:
        the IBMECMAccessControlType that is granted.

      • getGranteeName

        String getGranteeName()
        Returns the distinguished name or short name of the user or group that this access control is granted to.
        Returns:
        the grantee name

      • getGranteeId

        String getGranteeId()
        Returns the id of the user or group that this access control is granted to.
        Returns:
        the grantee id

      • getGranteeDisplayName

        String getGranteeDisplayName()
        Returns the display name of the user or group that this access control is granted to.
        Returns:
        the display name of the user or group

      • getGranteeType

        IBMECMAccessGranteeType getGranteeType()
        Returns the grantee type (a group or a user) that has been granted access.
        Returns:
        the IBMECMAccessGranteeType type

      • getPermissionSource

        IBMECMAccessControlSource getPermissionSource()
        Returns the source of the permission for this access control.
        Returns:
        the IBMECMAccessControlSource for this access control

      • getInheritableDepth

        IBMECMAccessInheritableDepth getInheritableDepth()
        Returns the maximum depth to which an access control is granted.
        Returns:
        the IBMECMAccessInheritableDepth for this access control
